description:
Popular characters from the Dengeki Comic version of Demon Gaze, including original characters, are joining the fray!

The following items are included:
Comic book character designs (set of 5) that do not appear in the game version
Oz/Fran/Camus/Mars/Cronus

*After downloading the DLC, you can select the character illustrations you have obtained from the Appearance tab during character creation.
*This content is available for a limited time only.
ã€€Period: February 3, 2022 - February 16, 2022
name: Fifth Collaboration: Dengeki Comics Demon Gaze Characters
